definition: dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
to divulge the will of heaven (idiom); to leak a secret/to let the cat out of the bag
a slogan used in reference to a project to improve greenery in some parts of Northern China

sentences.english: Remember to spend a day in Central Park watching a play by Shakespeare in the open air.
sentences.chinese: 記得花一天時間在中央公園露天看莎士比亞的戲劇。

sentences.english: In summer there were streetcars with open platforms.
sentences.chinese: 夏天，露天站臺上有多輛電車。

sentences.english: The picture shows Pingshuo Antaibao outdoor coal mine.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲平朔安太堡露天煤礦。
我們還是買露天看臺座位好了。

sentences.english: In open-pit mines, the problem of underground mining under the slope is usually encountered.
sentences.chinese: 邊坡下方井工開採是一個露天煤礦普遍存在的問題。

sentences.english: Canaries were formerly used in coal mines for this reason.
sentences.chinese: 爲此原因，露天煤礦以前經常使用金絲雀。

sentences.english: A floor under the bells of an open belfry .
sentences.chinese: 在露天鐘樓的鐘下面的那一層板。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the treatment approach and the main safety measures of open-air abandoned mine.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了露天廢棄礦山治理方式及主要安全措施。

sentences.english: The famine encouraged the spread of open-air markets throughout North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 饑荒下朝鮮各地露天市場的數量迅速增大。

sentences.english: A new type of outdoor grain bin was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 文章介紹了一種新型露天儲糧囤。

sentences.english: The bright sunshine augurs well for this afternoon's garden dance party.
sentences.chinese: 燦爛的陽光預示着今天下午的露天舞會能順利進行。

sentences.english: The ancient Roman ampthitheatre set in modern central Amman.
sentences.chinese: 安曼現代化城區裏的古羅馬露天劇場。

sentences.english: Bioleaching experiments on the open stripe nickel ore in Jinchuan Mine of China were carried out.
sentences.chinese: 進行了金川露天剝離鎳礦的生物浸出實驗。

sentences.english: Living area of the fan is unfavorable open boiler decorate.
sentences.chinese: 居住區內鍋爐的風機不宜露天佈置。

sentences.english: Installation of terrasses in a side-alley.
sentences.chinese: 沿小巷設置的露天茶座。

definition: balcony/patio/flat roof/terrace/deck (unroofed platform)/outdoor stage/ancient imperial celestial observation terrace
